events.message: I have filed a claim due to a car accident that occurred last night on the highway. My vehicle was severely damaged in the collision.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and photos provided by the claimant.
An insurance agent has been assigned to the case to assist the claimant with the next steps and any required documentation.
We have acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation process will begin shortly.
We have requested copies of the police report, driver’s license, and photos of the damaged vehicle for further processing.
The claimant submitted all requested documents, including the accident report and insurance policy details, for review.
Our claims team has started a thorough investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision and responsibility.
The investigation has been completed, and liability has been assessed based on the evidence and witness statements.
A settlement amount has been proposed to cover the cost of repairs and related expenses due to the auto accident.
The customer has responded positively to the settlement offer and expressed satisfaction with the timely handling of the claim.
The claim has been formally approved by the underwriting department following the customer’s acceptance of the settlement.
The payment for settlement has been issued electronically to the claimant’s bank account per policy terms.
The claim has been officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation of receipt from the claimant.
The case files and all related documents have been archived in the company system for future reference if necessary.
